resources.string: あなたは %s タイトルを持つ優秀なチェスコーチですか？

string.name: nmOrFideTitle
string.comment:
nmOrFideTitle
Part of sentence "Are you a great chess coach with a NM or FIDE title?"
The text links to our title verification page: https://lichess.org/help/master

resources.string: タイトルをこちらで証明してくだされば申請を審査します。

string.name: sendApplication
string.comment:
sendApplication
%s is the lichess email address

resources.string: %s までメールをお送りくだされば登録のための審査を行ないます。
現在、生徒を募集していません
%s の Lichess プロフィールを見る
プライベートメッセージを送る

string.name: allCountries
string.comment:
Appears as a select box option on the Coaches page (https://lichess.org/coach). As such, please keep this string short.
It is the default option. When selected. it means you are not filtering by country at all. Could alternatively be stated as 'Any country' or 'Show all countries'.
This string refers to the user's viewing options. A coach cannot state 'any country' on their profile.

string.name: lastLogin
string.comment: A filter on the coach page, letting users view only coaches who last logged in over a certain period of time.

string.name: lichessRating
string.comment: An option for coaches (https://lichess.org/coach) to list their Lichess rating. Coaches list their FIDE rating as standard, but have an option to separately list their rating on Lichess
